attributes.action: Ban the preservatives Sodium and Potassium Benzoate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In combination with ascorbic acid (vitamin C, E300), sodium benzoate and potassium benzoate may form benzene, a known carcinogen. Heat, light and shelf life can affect the rate at which benzene is formed.

However, some soft drinks contain on the ingredient list (As well as E211 - Sodium Benzoate), Ascorbic Acid (Which is known to catalyse the transformation from Sodium Benzoate to Benzene, a known Cancer Causing Chemical (CARCINOGEN)

These chemicals should be banned from human consumption, especially if included with Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) in the ingredients.
